Ghiscari Strait07487bpz3oypr8s5j007ce4rz16o2i0mirai1786302015-03-22T19:26:36ZThe Dragon Demands5014364/* References */[[Image:Ghiscari Strait.png|thumb|200px|A map showing the location of the Ghiscari Strait off the coast of Essos.]]
The '''Ghiscari Strait''' is a narrow body of water separating the islands of [[New Ghis]] from the mainland of [[Essos]]. It is located in [[Ghiscar]]i territory. The strait links the [[Gulf of Grief]] with the [[Summer Sea]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season2/#!/locations/astapor/ HBO viewers guide, season 2 map, Astapor entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'', the Ghiscari Strait separates the islands of New Ghis and Ghaen from the mainland.
